## The plan

1. Descriptive statistics worksheet
2. Upload photo of your datasheet to the [Scanned datasheets folder](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1D7S0GCKyukQIRwPGNQ1NnPuDJp0fUduo?usp=sharing) (or email the image file to me and I'll upload it)

3. Start processing biomass and soil samples following [Marsh sample processing procedures](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1M4OE7BUvFNgn0N8We2H8loJPctRDLbZeynfFM61EwkY/edit?usp=sharing)
